1.text: FIRST PC If you run the current code you will receive a wrong greeting: 'hey stranger', correct the code to display your name in the greeting.
hints: think about how the objects are saved

2.text: SWITCHER It would be nice to have some light on, right? Create a function that changes text to binary code and you will finally see what is around you.

3.text: DRAWER Create a function that can check if a word contains only unique characters. If you make this work the drawer will open.

4.text: ORANGE SLOT Create a function that encode the secret message to get a hint

7.text: dummy description 7 SHOULD OPEN EXIT DOOR

escapeDoorClosed.text: The Solid Door is closed, I see no Doorknob and it does not budge

needCode.text: There are 6 Numbers on the Safe. I could test around but it takes too long, I better find the code
